title: Cyber-Physical Threat Assessment
description: An operator sees a cyberattack on a power grid control system occur simultaneously with drone attacks on substations.

tasks.description: Fuse the cyber alert from the network sensors with the physical alerts from radar tracking the drones.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator correctly identifies that the cyber and physical attacks are part of a single, coordinated operation.

tasks.description: Assess the adversary's objective: to cause a widespread, prolonged power outage.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator correctly determines the strategic intent behind the coordinated attack.

tasks.description: Prioritize the physical drone threats to prevent further damage while simultaneously tasking cyber defense teams to restore the grid control system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator makes a correct decision to address both threats concurrently.
